website_summaries.verdict: Moisture sensors and smart technology make this condenser dryer even more energy efficient.
pros: Clothes may dry in less time than programmed, thanks to moisture sensors
cons: Drainage bin can be challenging to access

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work properly, very loud banging noise when drum rotated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condenser dryer. Very quiet. Multi functional. Seller arranged a delivery time suitable for me.
customer_reviews.author: dodger

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price & great communication
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my dryer and with all the different offers this one stood out for me.. Yes, the water container is at the bottom but all condenser dryers have this... Very easy to use and dries a lot faster than my other model.. The price, service & delivery were great.. the delivery team were very efficient with no fuss.. Cannot fault anything really.. I would highly recommend this model..
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Balta

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Never used this make before, so was abit nervous about buying this tumble dryer, but the possitave reviews made me take that leap of faith. Was a brilliant buy decent drum size plenty of space in there for a decent size washing, plenty of settings for all needs. Isn't very loud as well that's a bonus, older tumble dryers I have used in the past was like a jet engine. Cant speak on the cost on electricity as I haven't used it long enough, but it's just something you need in the winter. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: (sean)

customer_reviews.title: Works well and takes plenty of washing
customer_reviews.text: Rather to many programmes in my opinion and not as good as an earlier version I had before. It does however do the job and has a large barrel that takes a lot of washing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little noisy
customer_reviews.text: Still slightly noisy but is doing the job intended. Has even cut the drying time down from my last tumble dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Love all the features. Nevery had a Candy Tumble Dyer before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, but check out details such as accessability
customer_reviews.text: Works efficiently, but as a technological idiot, took me a while to work it out. Now I've done some of that, I'm very pleased with it. Still need to come to terms with more of the technical data. Although aged myself. I'm still quite active and fit, but fear that many would struggle with issues such as emptying the water unit.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mair Ann Davies

customer_reviews.title: Faulty on delivery
customer_reviews.text: Made loud banging noises on rotation of the drum. Applied for money back, rather than risking a replacement being faulty! Avoid this item. You would not believe the reply I got from AO. They said use it a few times and the banging should go away! I will not do that, as far as I’m concerned, the machine is faulty. Refunded by Amazon when AO refused.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Got a candy tumble drier as had one before which lasted me over 10yrs. I am not disappointed with my new machine. Its quiet ,easy to clean and is really robust and excellent value for money .I have it placed above my washing machine so love the fact the water collector is at the bottom of the machine. I highly recommend this brilliant drier
customer_reviews.author: tony sheaon

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer, a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dryer to replace old one. Had purchased a Candy washing machine earlier in the year so decided to go for the dryer as well. Good choice of programs, drum is more than enough at 8kg. Only complaint, it is a bit noisy. Sounds like a constant thumping noise. Have read other reviews and it seems this is just how it is. Otherwise it dries brilliantly and happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: ICE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: As a bloke who is head cook - bottle wash and laundry guy I'm always looking for items that are 1) Great value for money 2) easy to use and 3) have great reviews from a good number of previous buyers and users. This ticked all the boxes for me and I have absolutely no regrets with the purchase. You dont have to listen to me check out the reviews yourself. Ten out of Ten from me
customer_reviews.author: athers !

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: So far I have found this dryer to be easy to set up and quiet in operation. It starts off with declaring a time it will take to complete the cycle, but it seems to finish in half that time and I am happy about that. Cleaning out the fluff filter is very easy, but the water container, being at floor level, is a bit of a struggle only because I'm an old geezer and can't bend as well as I used to... Altogether I am very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you need to run it again to fully dry clothes
customer_reviews.text: It's very important to know the time needed to dry your clothes. For me it took me a few days because I had to run it twice every time I put clothes in so they would be fully dry. The best setting I found is to select mox and dry option and then increase the time to 2:30 hours. This will insure you that the clothes will be dry once the dryer is finished. Great product overall but a bit confusing at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Alsadah

customer_reviews.title: Great Tumble Dryer
customer_reviews.text: For only £200 this tumble dryer does everything you could hope for. Can dry lots of clothes at once. Very easy to use and I'm so glad I no longer have to dry my clothes at the launderette.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran McBride

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Tumble Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this item. It was easy to install, and dries the clothes very well, with a good choice of settings. It is easy to operate, and runs quietly. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Best condenser dryer I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is by fair the best condenser dryer I've bought. It has easy to use settings. Easy to clean and empty. This is great for a family where washer and dryer never seem to be off. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Terri Toner

customer_reviews.title: Very very very slow!
customer_reviews.text: It does dry clothes.....eventually! Took 4 hours to dry two large towels!! It was a replacement for another make as that broke down. The new one takes forever! Not economical at all. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: kate simpson

customer_reviews.title: After sales at Hoover/Candy non existent
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted when this dryer arrived easy to use and very efficient five weeks in and fifth time of using and it doesn’t work. Supposedly an engineer is coming to look at it after 4 hours on the phone with candy and amazon, AO who were the seller for this item took over this problem with Amazon, bypassing the manufacturer who really werent interested, and they are sending me out a new machine within 48 hours of my complaint and taking the faulty machine away. very impressed with AO and Amazon as always.
customer_reviews.author: Mr jeff mccarth

customer_reviews.title: A complicated affair.
customer_reviews.text: Stops when it thinks your clothes are dry. Not happy but a ball ache to keep swapping due to the size. First one was dented, second one packed up after two weeks. Third one seems to be working but it’s so over complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic big drum size
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant, super fast delivery also. Easy to work out how to use with a clear instruction booklet. I was actually very surprised at how much clothing i could dry at one time with this. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: good and well priced
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues, the sensor saves time on the default settings and being able to do it from my phone and just hold that up to the machine is great, fast drying and no issues to far
customer_reviews.author: D-Simpkin

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the performance of this dryer. Bought to replace my old dryer which I had for over 15 years, if this lasts as long will be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: When they said it was going to be delivered it came earlier than they said Two very nice men brought it and they were very helpful as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: This machine lasted a month. Will never buy a candi again. The water dispenser is in an awkward place and because it’s in a garage keep getting skint fingers. Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Murray

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Mine was delivered on 29th December 2019. It has since had 7 engineer visits to repair different faults, with the latest saying it could not be repaired and needed to be replaced. Replacement arriving Tuesday 18th 2020. Hopefully, this one will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, what more could you want for the money. These folk saying it steams up the room are basically a little stupid as it’s a condensing dryer not pipe outside so yes if you don’t open a window and your drying a heavy load of towels you’ll notice it. It’s the nature of the beast. It dries clothes to perfection and using the correct settings I’ve not managed to shrink anything yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use WiFi as only have IOS, don’t let that put you off as it’s an excellent machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now that I've had a tumble drier I cant live without one!!
customer_reviews.text: fabulous tumble drier, I was hesitant to buy it since there were some negative reviews on amazon but it's not complicated at all to use and it does the job well
customer_reviews.author: krain

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use however does not dry clothes!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last year, cheap but decent tumble drier it seemed. Not once have we managed to put on one wash and have our clothes dry. We are now putting the same load a minimum of 2/3 times per day and still not as dry as it should. We do clean and empty the tumble drier as per the instructions daily/most washes but still no difference. I therefore do not recommend this drier.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A bit fiddly but a great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Great tumble dryer all be it a little fiddly to use. Far quicker at drying that previous Wirlpool model we had. Deffinatly worth it for the money. The delivery company was great too. Would definitely recommend this company as they were great.
customer_reviews.author: mr m jenner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing performance
customer_reviews.text: My first tumble dryer, needs to be in the garage. Works beautifully, easy to empty water after use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Condencer drier
customer_reviews.text: Never had a condencer drier before, it takes a wee bit before of reading and trial and error before I could get the correct drying mode, once it is mastered it great
customer_reviews.author: loraine smith

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant tumble dryer
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant dry clean machine. Very glad, I brought one. Machine is quiet and easy to use. Communication and delivery were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Drys clothes quickly and the refresj setting is a godsend for busy mornings with kids.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wasn't expecting much. But I bought this to replace my old (more expensive) dryer and I'm so pleased I did. Its got so many different settings and drys the clothes very quickly. The refresh setting is perfect for my 2 kids, put uniforms in for 12 min on a morning and they come out fresh, warm and crease free. Easy to use and very quiet. I highly recomend this dryer, as for the price its very good.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this condenser tumble dryer as for the ease of the settings, to get rid of the old vent from our old dryer. A good looking machine, easy to maintain and our clothes come out dry and warm. For the price it's a fantastic value for money, not noisey at all, and when delivered it was well protected. A Great product Candy.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hewinson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what you want from a tumble dryer, its simple to use, with as many options as anyone could want and it does the job very well. Its reasonably quiet in use, and easy to keep clean. If you need a cheap and cheerful dryer, you could do much worse
customer_reviews.author: Bluefunk

customer_reviews.title: Good drier
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine it is easy to clean and nice and light. Only thing is it does take a while to dry even a light load also the heat it chucks out is sometime scary, you feel it when you walk in the room. Nice and simple to use and no problems to date.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fantastic and i love it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this amazing dryer on friday 27th and was due to get delivered on monday 30th. But it came on the 28th which was amazing as there are 7 peoples worth of washing to tackle. Easy to use and understand and so quiet. Cant love this dryer enough. Well done AO.com xx
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Harris-edwards

customer_reviews.title: Candy condenser dryer
customer_reviews.text: Dry's clothes well. Enough choice to decide on the type and level of drying. I'm more used to having a top drawer for emptying water collection and that the collection at the bottom of the Candy dryer would be a pain but have gotten used to it. For the price I can't find anything wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very quickly and before scheduled delivery slot which was great only negative was I didn’t get a message to say it was arriving that day but luckily someone was in to receive the dryer or it would have been a wasted journey, product great and does what it says on the tin!
customer_reviews.author: classycas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the rainy winter days
customer_reviews.text: After a very speedy delivery I am very happy with this product. Takes a while to learn the different settings and reading the manual but overall the perfect drier for me and my family
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte S

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Although I was concerned about the water collector and filter being at the base of the machine it has not been an issue. It is surprising how little water is collected compared to my old machine. An excellent choice and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver in our damp, concrete house. It does the clothes and sheets quickly. Haven't really read the instructions fully as my husband has been using it. I think he struggled to use the smart settings.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Does the job great! Only downside is making alot of condensation in the room is kept also the smart function doesn’t work on IOS.
customer_reviews.author: Razvan Nechifor

customer_reviews.title: Check the drying programs
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that I couldn’t choose a drying time myself. You had to stick to the programs times which didn’t always dry the clothes and there wasn’t a short program with heat to finish of the drying. The drum also makes a loud sound like similar to a heart beat when turning.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Fab machine.
customer_reviews.text: This has a really easy to clean fluff filter and water reservoir is so much bigger than my previous one. Love the fact that it intermittently turns the drum every 10 mins once cycle has finished to stop heavy creasing. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Claire Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant machine, great value for money, easy to use, perfect fit, drying time isn't long
customer_reviews.author: S.S.M

customer_reviews.title: Arrived faulty and loud.
customer_reviews.text: After 10 plus uses this is getting louder and louder. Makes 3 loud bangs with every turn of the drum. Amazon did however give a complete refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter. It's a little noisy but she likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Raymond Brown

customer_reviews.title: Simple operation and good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our older machine that stopped working. Easy to use and set up. The delivery driver called a few hours before delivery which was good.
customer_reviews.author: gareth priest

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: Drying clothes it dose what it supposed to and very quiet a good machine
customer_reviews.author: fcowen

customer_reviews.title: Noisy! Really noisy
customer_reviews.text: This tumble dryer is incredibly loud, it sounds like an aeroplane taking off.
customer_reviews.author: mrs stephanie todd

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple to use, looks good and a good size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: What a great dryer! Great value for money with multi choices for drying and additional smartphone feature!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Burton

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly?
customer_reviews.text: Good for clothes not for drying small children....most of my kids came out very crumpled
customer_reviews.author: Shaimaa

customer_reviews.title: We wanted a good dryer to dry the washing with the winter coming.
customer_reviews.text: The booklet that came with it was not clear enough. It took us a while to understand how to use it. It confused us by telling us about a pipe (which was probably for another machine). It took us a while to find the filter and the water container. Once we had found that, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Top quality tumble
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says! Easy to use and works a treat 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Marie Mosedale

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: No holes in walls have to be drilled. Plug in & go. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Value for money love my digital dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love my new dryer easy to use dryes clothes quick
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Its a treat
customer_reviews.text: Actually a gem in view. Dries clothes perfect and also don't have to iron them
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kent

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: An update on my old machine and if it does as well as the old one I’llbe very happyexelant
customer_reviews.author: Ian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Brill
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tumble dryer but a little confusing when you're used to one that only has two settings.
customer_reviews.author: Louisekatty

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to dry clothes which it does very well. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: To many programs most not needed quite confusing. No short program for damp clothing.
customer_reviews.author: David John Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great tumble dryer works well great delivery service would buy again and you get 10yr guarantee on parts
customer_reviews.author: tigger

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my new condenser dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of cycles to get used to new dryer, totally different to my old one, but am up and running now, it's a really good machine, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: alison young

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: The unit did not work from day 1, took over 3 weeks for AO to collect and refund as tried to pass the book.unfortunately very poor service from AO and even Amazon customer service as just kept going round in circles.
customer_reviews.author: Paulearnshaw

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Noisiest drier every. Sounds like some bricks are in the cylinder. Too noisy and door seal keeps coming off.
customer_reviews.author: JulieHP

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive condenser dryer but noisy and controls aren't the easiest to work out. Ok if you only use occasionally. Wouldn't buy again though Candy. Mainly for the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to fit. Don't fully understand the smartphone bit so can't use it. Relatively easy to use. Easy to empty water tray and filter
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tumble dryer for the cost far more high tech than expected :)
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst tumble dryer I've ever had. Had this 9 months its showing Error code 21 - takes three programme to get clothes dry. I'm definitely going to look to exchange this and go back to Bosh
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Tumble drier
customer_reviews.text: When it originally turned up 3 1/2 hours late I’m very pleased with product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just as good as my old one but at half the cost. Just hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work
customer_reviews.text: The wife is over the moon with the dryer everything is dried very quickly and are ready for ironing I would buy the same make again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not easy to.clean
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately I don't like it, doesn't work properly and its not easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Pasquale Giampa

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok when you study all instructions
customer_reviews.text: Found it very confusing to what settings to use would have preferred it to be easier.ie: high low settings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad machine
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months it broke down it said E21 i got my money back but they wont pick up the machine so im stuck with it hate this hard to work and it's broke down very angry
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Watson

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant dryer and great value for money. Delivery to suit you. Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.author: MRS KATHRYN JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after 4 months and it was almost impossible to get in touch to try get it repaired
customer_reviews.author: Gez

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: The carrier was vary efficient and helpful. The product matches what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Delyse

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Little bit noisier than expected, but dried well and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that is not made by the brand (s) that catch fire
customer_reviews.author: johncourier

customer_reviews.title: Totally unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: The machine did not work from day 1 and despite trying to get assistance with this for weeks now it is still not working!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Baigrie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Quiet easy to use multiple heat settings , easy to clean good value for money .
customer_reviews.author: Jackie jomes

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs and economical with the auto shut off functions
customer_reviews.author: Dido123

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match the Candy washing machine and I like it very much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hilary Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: This drier is big inside and out
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer it dries perfectly and doesn't take forever to do it on the smart programme.
customer_reviews.author: S Masser

customer_reviews.title: You were there to help
customer_reviews.text: Making a terrible noise when I first got it, engineer came out as drum had come off rollers in transit. All fine now
customer_reviews.author: Pat noble

customer_reviews.title: container not the easiest to get out
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but the water container not the easiest to get out
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Katrina Barber

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 months and apparently NO  Guarantee  apparently! I wonder why!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hab it 2 months broke down NO guarantee apparently. Well I wonder Why !!!!
customer_reviews.author: jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Not a top condenser
customer_reviews.text: Drying settings are misleading and the drying times are excessive. wouldnt recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Does the job easy to use very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: It Keeps breaking after only 6 weeks, turns itself of and doesn’t work so can never get drying done
customer_reviews.author: siamara

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Value for money. Easy to use. Maybe too many settings.
customer_reviews.author: David  toft

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good dryer. Easy to operate, efficient. That’s it! Love to all x
customer_reviews.author: P J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Came before it was suppose to, helpful staff very good product would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok good price
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Just the water tank is under a panel that has to be removed which is fiddly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Useless tumble dryer
customer_reviews.text: They have been back out to it 4 times in 4 months and it’s still not working steer clear
customer_reviews.author: Craig lilly
